00020 /* event queue */
00021 
00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 
00026 #include "event_queue.h"
00027 
00028 void event_queue_init(void) {
00029         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00030                 event_list[i].func = NULL;
00031                 event_list[i].time_target = 0;
00032                 event_list[i].id = 0;
00033         }
00034 }
00035 
00039 char event_queue_add(EVENT_MESSAGE event) {
00040         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00041                 if (event_list[i].func == NULL) {
00042                         event_list[i] = event;
00043                         return(i);
00044                 }
00045                 else if (event_list[i].time_target > event.time_target) {
00046                         EVENT_MESSAGE temp_event_list[EVENT_LIST_SIZE-i];
00047 
00048                         for (unsigned char count=0;count<EVENT_LIST_SIZE-i;count++)
00049                                 temp_event_list[count] = event_list[count+i];
00050 
00051                         event_list[i] = event;
00052 
00053                         for (unsigned char count=0;count<EVENT_LIST_SIZE-i-1;count++)
00054                                 event_list[i+count+1] = temp_event_list[count];
00055 
00056                         return(i);
00057                 }
00058         }
00059 
00060         return(-1);
00061 }
00062 
00065 void event_queue_wrap(unsigned int remove_val) {
00066         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00067                 if (event_list[i].func != NULL)
00068                         event_list[i].time_target -= remove_val;
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00074 EVENT_MESSAGE event_queue_get() {
00075         return(event_list[0]);
00076 }
00077 
00081 unsigned char event_in_queue(void) {    
00082         if (event_list[0].func != NULL)
00083                 return(1);
00084 
00085         return(0);
00086 }
00087 
00089 void event_queue_drop(void) {
00090         if (event_list[0].func != NULL) {
00091                 for (unsigned char i=1;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++)
00092                         event_list[i-1] = event_list[i];
00093         
00094                 event_list[EVENT_LIST_SIZE-1].func = NULL;
00095         }
00096 }
00097 
00100 unsigned char event_queue_count(void) {
00101         unsigned char i;
00102 
00103         for (i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++)
00104                 if (event_list[i].func == NULL)
00105                         break;
00106 
00107         return(i);
00108 }
00109 
00111 void event_queue_dropall(void) {
00112         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00113                 event_list[i].func = NULL;
00114                 event_list[i].time_target = 0;
00115                 event_list[i].id = 0;
00116         }       
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00122 int event_queue_drop_id(unsigned char id) {
00123         EVENT_MESSAGE temp_event_list[EVENT_LIST_SIZE];
00124         
00125         unsigned char id_dropped_count=0;
00126         unsigned char count=0;
00127 
00128         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00129                 if (event_list[i].id != id)
00130                         temp_event_list[count++] = event_list[i];
00131                 else
00132                         id_dropped_count++;
00133         }
00134 
00135         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00136                 if (i<(EVENT_LIST_SIZE-id_dropped_count))
00137                         event_list[i] = temp_event_list[i];
00138                 else {
00139                         event_list[i].func = NULL;
00140                         event_list[i].id = 0;
00141                         event_list[i].time_target = 0;
00142                 }       
00143         }
00144 
00145         return(id_dropped_count);
00146 }
00147 
00151 unsigned char event_queue_check_id(unsigned char id) {
00152         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++)
00153                 if (event_list[i].id == id)     //ID found, return 1
00154                         return(1);
00155 
00156         //No id match found, return 0
00157         return(0);
00158 }
